    • Method Detail

      • getMax

        public double getMax()

      • getMin

        public double getMin()

      • normalize

        public double normalize(double value)
        Returns a normalized value between 0 and 1 for the dataset the min and max were calculated for. In case if max == min the method always returns 1.

      • denormalize

        public double denormalize(double normalized)

      • normalizeAroundZero

        public double normalizeAroundZero(double value)
        Returns a value between -1.0 and 1.0. Zero stays zero.

      • normalizeAroundZero

        public double normalizeAroundZero(double value,
                         boolean omitIntervalCheck)

      • checkNormalized

        private void checkNormalized(double input,
                   double normalized)
                      throws java.lang.AssertionError

                   double normalized,
                   double min,
                   double max)

      • checkInterval

        private void checkInterval(double value,
                 double min,
                 double max)

      • checkIntervalAroundZero

        private void checkIntervalAroundZero(double value,
                           double min,
                           double max)

      • normalizeLog

        public double normalizeLog(double value)
        Returns a normalized log10(value) between 0 and 1. In case if max == min the method always returns 1.

      • normalizeLogAroundZero

        public double normalizeLogAroundZero(double value)
        Returns signum(value)*log10(abs(value)) normalized between -1 and 1. In case if max == min the method always returns signum(max).

      • normalizeLogAroundZero

        public double normalizeLogAroundZero(double value,
                            boolean omitIntervalCheck)
